ThingDef.label: fake vivi antennae
ThingDef.description: A fake antenna made from fibers mixed with Vivi cream. It doesn't help much, but it looks better than not having one.

ThingDef.label: fake vivi wing
ThingDef.description: A fake wing made from fibers mixed with Vivi cream. It doesn't help much, but it looks better than not having one.

ThingDef.label: bionic vivi antennae
ThingDef.description: a bionic vivi antennae made with foreign technology. Not only can it move like a real antenna, but it can also detect further distances due to its built-in advanced sensors.

ThingDef.label: bionic vivi wing
ThingDef.description: a bionic vivi wing made with foreign technology. Not only can it flutter like a real wing, but it can also move with less effort and is much lighter.
